<h3 id="X35817">X(35817) = HOMOTHETIC CENTER  OF THESE TRIANGLES: 2nd KENMOTU-FREE-VERTICES AND INNER-YFF TANGENTS</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^2*(a^5-(b+c)*a^4-2*(b+c)^2*a^3+2*(b+c)*(b^2+3*b*c+c^2)*a^2-(2*a^3-2*(b+c)*a^2-2*(b^2-4*b*c+c^2)*a+2*(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))*S+(b^4+c^4+2*(2*b^2-7*b*c+2*c^2)*b*c)*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*(b^2+8*b*c+c^2))  :  :
<p>X(35817) lies on these lines:
{1,371}, {6,12000}, {12,35797}, {372,10679}, {485,10596}, {486,10528}, {3071,32213}, {5418,10586}, {5552,10577}, {6200,16203}, {6396,11248}, {6420,19047}, {6561,10805}, {6564,10531}, {6565,10942}, {10803,35767}, {10834,35777}, {10878,35783}, {10915,35789}, {10929,35795}, {10930,35793}, {10955,35799}, {10956,35801}, {10958,35803}, {10965,35809}, {11239,35823}, {11400,35765}, {11509,35769}, {11729,35882}, {11881,35781}, {11882,35779}, {11914,35791}, {11955,35807}, {11956,35805}, {12115,35821}, {12189,35825}, {12356,35699}, {12376,13217}, {12381,35827}, {12430,35837}, {12594,35841}, {12648,35843}, {12686,35845}, {12703,35611}, {12749,35853}, {12775,35857}, {12874,35863}, {12905,35835}, {12971,13121}, {13094,35865}, {13104,35851}, {13105,35754}, {13109,35867}, {13112,35869}, {13118,35829}, {13130,35871}, {13132,35833}, {13134,35831}, {13189,35879}, {13278,35883}, {13313,35881}, {13716,35873}, {13839,35875}, {13906,35815}, {13964,35813}, {16154,35855}, {18542,35787}, {18545,23261}, {19048,35771}, {22731,35839}, {22768,35785}, {22886,35849}, {22931,35847}, {22982,35861}, {26333,35786}, {32309,35877}, {32405,35859}, {34339,35610}</p>
